info.title: E-Commerce API
info.description: API documentation for the e-commerce application

tags.name: Admin
tags.description: Admin-only endpoints for accessing all users' data

get.description: Returns a simple hello world message
Retrieves a list of all users. **Admin only.**
Retrieves a specific user by their ID. **Requires authentication.**

put.description: Updates an existing user. **Users can only update their own profile.**

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token

get.description: Retrieves all roles assigned to a user. **Users can only see their own roles.**

post.description: Assigns a role to a user. **Admin only.**

get.description: Retrieves a list of all products with optional search filter. **Public endpoint - no authentication required.**

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter products by name or description

get.description: Retrieves a specific product by its ID. **Public endpoint - no authentication required.**
Retrieves a list of all categories. **Public endpoint - no authentication required.**
Retrieves a specific category by its ID. **Public endpoint - no authentication required.**
Retrieves all products in a specific category. **Public endpoint - no authentication required.**

200.description: List of products in the category

get.description: Retrieves a list of all roles. **Requires authentication.**
Retrieves a specific role by its ID. **Requires authentication.**
Retrieves all users with a specific role. **Admin only.**

200.description: List of users with the role

get.summary: Get or create cart for user
get.description: Retrieves the cart for a user, creating one if it doesn't exist. **Users can only access their own cart.**
Returns the number of items in a user's cart. **Users can only access their own cart count.**

post.description: Adds a product to a cart. **Users can only add to their own cart.**

delete.description: Removes a product from a cart. **Users can only remove from their own cart.**

get.summary: Get all mailing addresses for user
get.description: Retrieves all mailing addresses for a specific user. **Users can only access their own addresses.**

post.description: Creates a new mailing address for a user. **Users can only create their own addresses.**

get.description: Retrieves a specific mailing address by its ID. **Users can only access their own addresses.**

put.description: Updates an existing mailing address. **Users can only update their own addresses.**

delete.description: Deletes an existing mailing address. **Users can only delete their own addresses.**

get.summary: Get all payment methods for user
get.description: Retrieves all payment methods for a specific user. **Users can only access their own payment methods.**

post.description: Creates a new payment method for a user. **Users can only create their own payment methods.**

get.description: Retrieves a specific payment method by its name. **Users can only access their own payment methods.**

put.description: Updates an existing payment method. **Users can only update their own payment methods.**

delete.description: Deletes an existing payment method. **Users can only delete their own payment methods.**

get.description: Retrieves all phone numbers for a specific user. **Users can only access their own phones.**

post.description: Creates a new phone number for a user. **Users can only create their own phones.**

get.description: Retrieves a specific phone number by its ID. **Users can only access their own phones.**

put.description: Updates an existing phone number. **Users can only update their own phones.**

delete.description: Deletes an existing phone number. **Users can only delete their own phones.**

get.description: Retrieves all carts for all users. **Admin only.**
Retrieves all mailing addresses for all users. **Admin only.**
Retrieves all phone numbers for all users. **Admin only.**
Retrieves all payment methods for all users. **Admin only.**
